Hotel.name: Crowne Plaza Dubai Hotel and Apartments

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Crowne Plaza Dubai, you'll be centrally located in Dubai, convenient to Dubai International Financial Centre and Dubai Mall. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Centre and Jumeirah Mosque.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 568 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a nightclub, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to the beach or shopping on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can enjoy drinks at a bar and dine alfresco (weather permitting). Or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A shuttle from the hotel to the airport is complimentary at scheduled times.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can enjoy drinks at a bar and dine alfresco (weather permitting). Or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Dubai International Financial Centre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Dubai International Convention and Exhibition Centre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Jumeirah Mosque - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Dubai Mall - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
KidZania - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Dubai Zoo - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Burj Khalifa - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Zabeel Park - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
The Dubai Fountain - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Dubai International Art Centre - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Mercato Shopping Mall - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Souk al Bahar - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Lamcy Plaza - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Zabeel Stadium - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Wafi City Mall - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi

The preferred airport for Crowne Plaza Dubai is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Crowne Plaza Dubai is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Compulsory Tourism Dirham to be paid by guest directly to the hotel per room per night. No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No name change is allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.
